name: Airo University
description:
The first official release of Airo University is here!

Airo University is a life simulator where you're a new student studying at the prestigious Airo university. During your stay there, you'll have to manage your grades, friendships, and your weight!

Much of the games mechanics are explained during the tutorial of the game, but a brief overview is that you have a set amount of actions every day, and what you do with those actions is completely up to you. Go to the park, read a book, see a friend. All up to you!

This game has a focus on weight gain, if you're not into that there may still be some things for you to enjoy here. But if you're not a fan of it I recommend staying away.

I would really appreciate any feedback on this project, as well as bug reports.

I'll be active here and on Weight Gaming Forum, so head over there if you're interested in having a say in the projects development

I hope you enjoy your stay at Airo University!
